name: Various Scripts
short_description: List of utility scripts / small projects
highlights: Block website IP for set amount of time to study without distraction
Excel file formatter for colleagues packaged as distributable .exe
Parse PDF to extract client zipcodes using .rtf format and regex
Transcribe video and audio file using OpenAI Whisper model
Use HuggingFace QA pipeline to read course note PDF and create study flash cards
